cause.description:
This cause, as weird as it sounds, needs to be addressed. There are a million graduates who get sucked into this capitalist world and end up with nothing except confusion and havoc. Therefore, contribute to the cause.
"When the story of these times gets written, we want it to say that we did all we could, and it was more than anyone could have imagined" - Bono.
1. The future needs a change.
2. We are the future.
3. We need money.
cause.mission: Provide Assistance- Financial, Social and Mental
cause.name: UNEMPLOYED GRADUATES
